content: That soccer player is feeling it in his leg. He played yesterday and he had a couple of nasty challenges at him, but luckily he didn't get hurt.
translations: ita:Quel calciatore se lo sta sentendo nella gamba. Ha giocato ieri e gli ha fatto un paio di brutti contrasti, ma per fortu
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by DJ_Saidez (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
